projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This project utilizes DOM manipulation and renders a table that displays hourly totals, and daily totals based on maximum customers, minimum customers and average cookies. When the user inputs new data, the table updates

projects.title: Gitris
projects.description: This project is a working clone of the video game, Tetris. After the user finishes playing, they can input their initials and it'll display on the ranked leaderboard page. This site also comes with a how to play page and a history/funfacts page where the user can play a 7 question trivia game that displays the user's score.
